page.title: Page A
page.text: Horses are hoofed mammals that have lived with humans for thousands of years. [[Page A]]

page.title: Page B
page.text: Members of a horse band are not simply group animals with ganglike mentalities.[[Page A]]

page.title: Page C
page.text: In prehistoric times the wild horse was probably first hunted for food.[[Page B]] [[Page D]

page.title: Page D
page.text: The relationship of the horse to humans has been unique. [[Page A]] [[Page C]]

page.title: Page E
page.text: A mature male horse is called a stallion, the female a mare.[[Page E]][[Page F]] [[Page G]]

page.title: Page F
page.text: The horse's general form is characteristic of an animal of speed[[Page H]]

page.title: Page G
page.text: The extremely large eyes placed far back on the elongated[[Page C]]

page.title: Page H
page.text: The brown horse is almost black but has lighter areas.
